Errors Documentation¶

This page contains the Errors Module documentation.

The errors Module¶

exception AddressBookError¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Master Exception Class for the address book.

exception AddressBookNameError¶

Bases: errors.AddressBookError

Sub Exception Class for the address book. Name already in address book.

exception ConnectionError¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Master Exception Class for the Connection module.

exception ConnectorError¶

Bases: errors.ConnectionError

Sub Exception Class for the Connector module.
